text: Richard Whalley Anthony Curtis (born 8 November 1956) is a New Zealand screenwriter and movie producer and director.Biography He was born in Wellington. He lives in England. He gained a Bachelor of Arts degree in English Language and Literature from Christ Church, Oxford. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1956 births Category:Living people Category:Alumni of the University of Oxford Category:New Zealand movie directors Category:New Zealand movie producers Category:New Zealand screenwriters Category:Writers from Wellington Category:Television writers
title: Richard Curtis
